skill.name: internal-comms
skill.description: A set of resources to help me write all kinds of internal communications, using the formats that my company likes to use. Claude should use this skill whenever asked to write some sort of internal communications (status reports, leadership updates, 3P updates, company newsletters, FAQs, incident reports, project updates, etc.).
skill.summary: A set of resources to help me write all kinds of internal communications, using the formats that my ...
skill.author: Azeem-2

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and formatting guidelines. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access beyond its own files, or environment variable access detected. This is a low-risk content-only skill.

content.value_statement: Writing internal communications like newsletters and status reports takes time and consistency. This skill provides ready-made templates and formatting guidelines for 3P updates, company-wide newsletters, FAQ responses, and other internal announcements.
actual_capabilities: Draft company-wide newsletters with section organization
Create FAQ responses from common employee questions
Format status reports and leadership updates
Generate incident reports and project updates
Apply consistent communication style and tone
limitations: Does not access company data automatically - requires user input
Does not send or deliver communications - only generates content
Does not integrate with Slack, email, or other platforms directly
Does not maintain communication history between sessions

use_cases.title: Weekly team updates
use_cases.description: Generate concise 3P updates summarizing progress, next plans, and blockers for leadership review.

use_cases.title: Company-wide announcements
use_cases.description: Draft polished newsletters that synthesize announcements, milestones, and news for all employees.

use_cases.title: FAQ documents
use_cases.description: Create clear Q&A documents addressing common employee questions about company policies and events.

prompt_templates.title: Weekly 3P Update
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a 3P update for [Team Name] covering this week. Include 1-3 sentences each for Progress, Plans, and Problems. Use an appropriate emoji.

prompt_templates.title: Company Newsletter
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft a company newsletter with 20-25 bullet points. Include sections for Announcements, Progress on Priorities, Leadership Updates, and Social Updates.

prompt_templates.title: FAQ Response
prompt_templates.prompt: Create 3-5 FAQ entries based on common employee questions. Format each with Question and Answer sections.

prompt_templates.title: Incident Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Write an incident report covering the timeline, impact, resolution, and next steps for a recent service issue.

output_examples.input: Write a 3P update for the Engineering team covering this week
output: Progress: Shipped 3 features including user authentication improvements. Fixed 12 bugs and reduced API latency by 20%.
Plans: Focus on database optimization sprint. Begin Q2 roadmap planning and kick off mobile app redesign project.
Problems: Two senior engineers on leave creating capacity constraints. Waiting on security review for payment integration.

best_practices: Keep 3P updates to 30-60 seconds of reading time with 1-3 sentences per section
Front-load important information and use active voice throughout
Include metrics and data when possible to support claims
anti_patterns: Avoid overly long paragraphs that bury key information
Do not skip the Problems section - transparency builds trust
Avoid jargon that assumes deep context from readers

faq.question: Which AI tools work with this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Each platform may have slightly different formatting capabilities.

faq.question: Does this skill access my company data?
faq.answer: No. The skill provides templates and guidelines but does not connect to Slack, email, or other tools automatically.

faq.question: Can I customize the templates?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill generates content you can edit. You can also ask for custom formats that fit your company style.

faq.question: How should I prepare information for 3P updates?
faq.answer: Gather metrics, recent accomplishments, upcoming priorities, and any blockers. The skill will help structure this into the 3P format.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. All processing happens within the AI conversation. No data is stored or transmitted to external servers by this skill.

faq.question: How does this differ from other writing tools?
faq.answer: This skill focuses specifically on internal business communications with proven formats. It does not generate general content like emails or documents.
